## Entity class

Class to generate a entity before returning data

You can re-map some fields, like \_id to id And keep the only fields authorized by the ABAC policy

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Entity 
```

## Example


```
// Define which fields to remap
const map = {_id: 'id'};
// Create your entity
const user = new Entity(doc, map);
// Filter data
entity.keep(['id', 'firstname']);
// Or you can also filter data with the remove method
entity.remove(['email','mobile']);
// Then get the values
entity.get();
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(doc, map)](./subito-graphql.entity._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>Entity</code> class |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [get()](./subito-graphql.entity.get.md) |  | Get the mapped &amp; filtered data |
|  [keep(fields)](./subito-graphql.entity.keep.md) |  | Define which fields to keep in the entity |
|  [remove(fields)](./subito-graphql.entity.remove.md) |  | Define which fields to remove in the entity |
